alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 06 at 5:27PM MST until November 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... ...RED FLAG WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has cancelled the Red Flag Warning. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 229 and 230. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
